summary: Provides a collection of internal utilities for the Ansible test framework, including shared configuration access, graceful exit handling, result type definitions, shell script templating, and assorted helpers for managing temporary files/directories, executing commands, handling Python interpreter paths, and writing test result data.
business_intent: Enable reliable execution and management of Ansible test commands by supplying common configuration, resource cleanup, command orchestration, and result recording facilities needed by the test suite.
